text: Guerrilla Cambridge (formerly SCE Europe and SCEE Cambridge Studio) was a British video game developer. It was founded in 1997 as Sony Computer Entertainment Europe but was renamed in 2013 as a sister studio to Guerrilla Games. == History == The studio was founded in July 1997 as Sony Computer Entertainment's main European divison. In 2003, they rebranded to SCEE Cambridge Studio, later shortened to Cambridge Studio in 2010. Later in 2013, SCE rearranged the company as a sister studio to Guerrilla Games. Category:Video game companies of the United Kingdom
title: Guerrilla Cambridge
